comments.body:
The following could be considered an unnecessary cast and optimized away,  right?

```scala
def test[T](x: Expr[T])(implicit t: Type[T]): Expr[T] = '{
    val x2: ~t = ~x
    x2
  }
```
->
```scala
val x2: ~(t) = ~(x).asInstanceOf[t.unary_~]
x2:t.unary_~
```
Yes. Though I would do optimizations later as more refactoring will happen after this PR.
